title: Discover America
creator_credit: Reid Ray Films and Reid H Ray
brief_description: The United States from the air, mostly filmed from a helicopter. The scenes are varied - the Statue of Liberty, the Grand Canyon, the Rockies, Las Vegas, Disneyland and the volcanic Mount Pelee in Hawaii. Also shows other sites of historical interest. Excellent photography by David Butler. Narrated by Meredith Burgess.
